prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with gray feathers and a striking yellow beak.
Design a bird-like Pokemon that has a sleek body and distinctive wing patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a dove, with a calm demeanor and gentle colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can soar high in the sky and has a powerful wing flap.
Make a Pokemon that embodies grace in flight, featuring elegant plumage and bright eyes.
Show me a Pokemon with a mix of gray and white colors, perfect for blending into urban environments.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that has a serene personality and loves to explore forested areas.
